name: VR-Space Visit 3D
description:
Vr Space Visit 3d is a short guided tour of our planets and a few stars in virtual reality.
It will let you real experience as you desire. Navigate your device around 360 D to explore all in image of our planet's in this game. A fully 3d models of many places.
How to Play:
Press play Button
Put your device into VR glasses
Use revolving chair or stand in open place
You are free to move forward/backward and left/right just rotating on your axis
Also visualize up/down view
Features:
360 degree rotation.
Stunning 3D Graphics
No time Limit, unlimited play and fun
Play it anytime, anywhere!
Various places.
360 images.
Nice graphics.
Reality scene.
